title: Registered successfully
desc:
Congratulations!
You have successfully registered, now use your credentials to log in

title: Message sent
desc: Thanks for leaving your email, we will read it soon

title: Message not sent
desc:
Failed to send your message.
We apologize for that

title: Confirm your email
desc:
It order to finish registration, you should confirm your email address.
Go to your mail service and find confirmation email.

title: Password reset registered
desc: Your password reset request has been registered. Visit your mail to confirm reset.

title: Password reset
desc: Password reset token confirmed. Password has been reset, use it now to log in

title: Operation Failed
desc: Some of the passwords are invalid, or password repeat doesn't match the original

title: Password changed
desc: Password changed successfully, now log in with new credentials
